Description of incident: On October 21, 2014 SCORE discovered an unauthorized access to their server that processes customer payment information.According to the company on September 4, 2014 unauthorized access to their website compromised personal information of individuals who completed a transaction.The information includes names, payment card account numbers, expiration dates of cards, SCORE account numbers. Those who were affected conducted a transaction between June 1, 2014 and September 4, 2014. There was no evidence that customer addresses or security codes being compromised after an investigation was conducted.For those with questions or concerns call 1-800-626-77741-800-626-7774.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-46986CallSend SMSAdd to SkypeYou'll need Skype CreditFree via Skype
